text: Christy Carlson Romano (born March 20, 1976) is an American actress and musician. She recorded songs for Disney-related movies. She was the voice for the title character in the show Kim Possible. She also played a trick-or-treat child in Everyone Says I Love You in 1988. Carlson Romano was born in Connecticut. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Connecticut Category:Singers from Connecticut
title: Christy Carlson Romano
